properties.entry: INSERT INTO BOOK (BOOK_NO , SELLER , BOOK_NAME , PRICE , AUTHOR , PUBLISHER , IS_NOTED , CONDITION , IS_DIRECT , LOCATION , PUBLICATION_DATE, API_IMG, CONTENT, LIST_PRICE) VALUES (SEQ_BKNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO BOOK_ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO , BOOK_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_BKFNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_BKNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , ?)

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT BOOK_NO , BOOK_NAME , PRICE , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS TITLEIMG FROM BOOK B LEFT OUTER JOIN BOOK_ATTACHMENT USING (BOOK_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM BOOK B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.SELLER = M.USER_NO) WHERE BOOK_NO = ?
SELECT ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM BOOK_ATTACHMENT WHERE BOOK_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS TITLEIMG , PRICE , BOOK_NO FROM BOOK B LEFT OUTER JOIN BOOK_ATTACHMENT USING (BOOK_NO) WHERE B.BOOK_NAME = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
